title: India Ranks 3rd Globally In AI Competitiveness, Surpassing Major Economies: Stanford Report

Behind the US and China, India outperforms several advanced economies, thanks to its strong tech ecosystem, skilled talent, rising investments, and robust AI research, highlighting its growing role in the global AI landscape.

title: Asia's rich drive a $200-billion revival in complex equity notes
description: Wealthy Asian investors are pouring record funds into complex stock products. Issuance of these products linked to Hong Kong and Singapore equities has surged significantly this year. Accumulators and fixed-coupon notes are particularly popular. This trend coincides with a surge in Asian equities driven by artificial intelligence. These instruments offer controlled stock exposure, though complexity can amplify losses.
